Detailed Description

The CommunicationTags oversee the handling of the communication tags.

Definition at line 37 of file communications_tags.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

◆ generate()

int bitpit::CommunicationTags::generate ( MPI_Comm communicator)

Generates a unique tag.

If the trash is empty a new tag is generated, otherwise a tag taken from the trash is recycled.

The tag is shared among the processes that belong to the specified communicator.

Parameters
communicatoris the MPI communicator
Returns
A new unique tag.

Definition at line 76 of file communications_tags.cpp.

◆ trash()

void bitpit::CommunicationTags::trash ( int tag,
MPI_Comm communicator )

Trashes a tag.

A trashed tag is a tag no more used that can be recycled.

Parameters
tagis the tag that will be trashed
communicatoris the MPI communicator
